title: 5 Best Stocks to Buy and Hold According to Bill Gates' Portfolio
text: Number of Hedge Fund Holders: 302 Bill Gates’ Stake: $14.4 billion An Overweight rating and a $490 price target were maintained on Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) on March 21 by Keybanc analysts. Based in Redmond, Washington, Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is a big tech company. It operates in the systems software industry to develop and support software, services, devices, and solutions. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) was seen in the portfolios of 302 hedge funds in the fourth quarter, with a total stake value of $87.3 billion.
